title: How to get a bank statement
text: Bank statement is required while applying for VISA.
page: How to get a bank statement

title: SBI Users with net banking facility
text:
• Sign in to your net banking account at onlinesbi .
• Go to Account Statement section.
• Now download your bank statement in PDF format.
• Get it printed.
• Go to the SBI office and get it stamped by the manager.
page: How to get a bank statement
